entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
